16#define PKSAV_GEN2_BOX_NUM_POKEMON (20)
17#define PKSAV_GEN2_PARTY_NUM_POKEMON PKSAV_STANDARD_POKEMON_PARTY_SIZE
18#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES PKSAV_STANDARD_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES
19
20#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NICKNAME_LENGTH PKSAV_STANDARD_NICKNAME_LENGTH
21#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTNAME_LENGTH PKSAV_GEN2_TRAINER_NAME_LENGTH
22#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTNAME_STORAGE_LENGTH (10)
23
24#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_MOVE_PP_MASK ((uint8_t)0x3F)
25#define PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_MOVE_PP(field) ((field) & PKSAV_GEN1_POKEMON_MOVE_PP_MASK)
26
27#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_MOVE_PP_UP_OFFSET (6)
28#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_MOVE_PP_UP(field) ((field) >> PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_MOVE_PP_UP_OFFSET)
29
30#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LEVEL_CAUGHT_MASK ((uint16_t)0x3F00)
31#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LEVEL_CAUGHT_OFFSET (8)
32
33#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LEVEL_CAUGHT(field) \
34 (((field) & PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LEVEL_CAUGHT_MASK) >> PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LEVEL_CAUGHT_OFFSET)
35
36#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTGENDER_MASK ((uint16_t)0x0080)
37#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_LOCATION_MASK ((uint16_t)0x007F)
38
39#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_EGG_INDEX (0xFD)
40#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_EXPERIENCE_BUFFER_SIZE (3)
41#define PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_BOX_NAME_LENGTH (8)
42
43#pragma pack(push,1)

51struct pksav_gen2_pc_pokemon
52{
60 uint8_t species;
68 uint8_t held_item;
72 uint8_t moves[PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES];
78 uint16_t ot_id;
85 uint8_t exp[PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_EXPERIENCE_BUFFER_SIZE];
91 uint16_t ev_hp;
97 uint16_t ev_atk;
103 uint16_t ev_def;
109 uint16_t ev_spd;
118 uint16_t ev_spcl;
125 uint16_t iv_data;
134 uint8_t move_pps[PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NUM_MOVES];
141 uint8_t friendship;
147 uint8_t pokerus;
163 uint16_t caught_data;
167 uint8_t level;
168};
169
176struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data
177{
183 uint8_t condition;
185 uint8_t unused;
193 uint16_t current_hp;
202 uint16_t max_hp;
211 uint16_t atk;
220 uint16_t def;
229 uint16_t spd;
238 uint16_t spatk;
247 uint16_t spdef;
248};
249
251struct pksav_gen2_party_pokemon
252{
258 struct pksav_gen2_pc_pokemon pc_data;
259
267 struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data party_data;
268};
269
271struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_party
272{
274 uint8_t count;
287 uint8_t species[PKSAV_GEN2_PARTY_NUM_POKEMON + 1];
289 struct pksav_gen2_party_pokemon party[PKSAV_GEN2_PARTY_NUM_POKEMON];
296 uint8_t otnames[PKSAV_GEN2_PARTY_NUM_POKEMON][PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTNAME_STORAGE_LENGTH + 1];
303 uint8_t nicknames[PKSAV_GEN2_PARTY_NUM_POKEMON][PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NICKNAME_LENGTH + 1];
304};
305
307struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_box
308{
310 uint8_t count;
323 uint8_t species[PKSAV_GEN2_BOX_NUM_POKEMON + 1];
325 struct pksav_gen2_pc_pokemon entries[PKSAV_GEN2_BOX_NUM_POKEMON];
332 uint8_t otnames[PKSAV_GEN2_BOX_NUM_POKEMON][PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTNAME_STORAGE_LENGTH + 1];
339 uint8_t nicknames[PKSAV_GEN2_BOX_NUM_POKEMON][PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NICKNAME_LENGTH + 1];
341 uint8_t padding[2];
342};
343
345struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_box_names
346{
353 uint8_t names[PKSAV_GEN2_NUM_POKEMON_BOXES][PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_BOX_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
354};
